    • addTransition

      public boolean addTransition​(State state, java.lang.Character key, State value)
      Add a transition to the automaton
      Parameters:
      state - the state on which the transition is added
      key - a value of our alphabet
      value - a state in the whole state
      Returns:
      true if add , false otherwise

    • getState

      public State getState​(java.lang.String name)
      Allows to obtain a precise state, by its name
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the desired state
      Returns:
      the requested state if found, otherwise null if not found

    • verifAutomaton

      sentence - the string to check
      Returns:
      true if the string is in the correct format, otherwise false
